text_block_list.name: Mysterious Sunglassed Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: Heave-ho, heave-ho!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I can't see anything! Argh, just what are you girls up to!?

text_block_list.name: Mysterious Sunglassed Horsegirl 1
text_block_list.text: She… She knows it's us, Vivlos!

text_block_list.name: Mysterious Sunglassed Horsegirl 2
text_block_list.text:
Huuuh～? That's strange… 
I heard this would totally work though☆

text_block_list.name: Mysterious Sunglassed Horsegirl 3
text_block_list.text:
W-Well, since we've already come this far, 
let's just push through to the end!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Ugh…! I can finally see a… gain…? This is… a private beach…?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…Y-Yeah. So… even if everyone made a racket here, 
we won't disturb anyone…

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Everyone…? If you mean the five of us chatting, that won't ——

text_block_list.name: Photo Shoot Makeup Staff
text_block_list.text: Good wooork～ We were also invited♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: All of the photo shoot staff!?

text_block_list.name: Resort PR Manager
text_block_list.text:
Ah, well… hahah. Cheval Grand and her friends approached us, 
and we decided to participate as well.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Even the PR manager…!? And the resort staff members…? 
Cheval, what is this about…?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…"I'll be the only one who won't have their heartfelt 
expressions captured, but it can't be helped". 
I thought you might dismiss it like that. But ——

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: We've been laughing a lot.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Making a big commotion.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …And having a lot of fun.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Amidst all that, only you had so few photos taken. 
Even though… you've given us such a wonderful time.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
That's why… That's why…! I want you to… experience the same 
feelings! Not returning the favour… would be regrettable.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …… …………Puh. Ahahaha! This… you really got one up on me.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: ……This is far from all, Crown.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
That's right. We've not unveiled 
the main event yet… and, behold!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Wh-What is with this gargantuan desert!?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Hehe… It's a thanks for this shoot. We wanted to surprise you.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
By the way… Cheval and I made it together. 
Although we're not experienced, we learnt how to.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
The two of you made such a huge dessert!? 
Ah… on the surface it looks like a parfait, 
but now that I really look at it ——

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Mango pudding, waffles, douhua… and these are egg tarts… Ahaha, there's even turtle jelly!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
It's a special dessert created under the supervision of 
the Satono Grand Resort. A limited product… made only 
for today. Ahaha…

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: 好犀利呀 (It's so impressive)… Every decoration is so pretty… Hehe, how lovely.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Although, so many of my favourite foods are gathered in here. 
Have I ever eaten such local desserts in front of you all?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: That, umm… We asked.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
我想請教下佢鐘意咩甜品…… 
(I'd like to ask what her favourite desserts are……)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Your family. What kind of desserts you like.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: We tried to fit as many of them as possible into a dessert… It turned into such a huge thing in the end though… ahahaha.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Cheval… Shion… thank you. 
I didn't expect such a wonderful surprise ——

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Eheh! But this ain't the end, Crown. 
We actually still have more. An ace up our sleeves!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
That's righty, since we thought up all these different things, 
we need you to enjoy every one of them♪

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
—— Cheval, Crown, sorry for keeping you waiting. 
I will be the one serving you. I ——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: —— Student of "ultimate cuteness".

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Duramente!? Did you bring that kind of swimsuit with you!?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
I'll explaaaiiin☆ Duramente requested my help, saying, 
"I want to draw out Crown's smiling and surprised face". 
So I put together a whole outfit for her!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
…Donning a brand-new swimsuit to induce a 
different attitude… I learnt that from Cheval. 
Come, I will feed you personally.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Indeed you're very cute! 
Though, aren't you learning the wrong things!?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …Aah, come on, am I supposed to be touched or retort you girls!? …Hehe, man, everyone put in all this effort for me…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: See, now, this moment… we should capture…!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Crown, don't think about making an expression. 
Because the most important thing are your raw, 
heartfelt feelings.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Heheh…! …You're right! I know that♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah… I was surprised, and shocked, and laughed a lot. My facial muscles were really put to work today.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: For me… that's been the case all the days I've been here.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …Hehe, true. I've almost never seen you change expressions as often before.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…Yeah. Thanks to that… I've become more able to like myself. 
Even now, I am feeling that way a little.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Thank you… for inviting me.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Hehe. I also want to express my gratitude. Thanks to you and the others, we got to take great photos.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …I'm glad I invited you.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Me too… I'm glad that I participated.

text_block_list.name: Crown & Cheval
text_block_list.text: ……Hehehe.
